entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
